121770.「あの……すみません。\n 私 シュリナと申す者ですが\n 占いの館は こちらで:
Excuse me. My name is Shrina. Is this the
Divine House?

121771.「はっ！ せっ せせせせ……先生っ！？\n すいません！ ごめんなさい！\n お:
Ha! Sess...se-se-se-se...senpai! I'm
sorry! I'm sorry! I think I got the wrong
room!

121772.「いいえ 間違っていませんよ。\n ようこそ 占いの館へ。お待ちしていました。\:
No, you are not wrong. Welcome to Divine
House. We've been expecting you. Please come
and have a seat.

121773.「ええっ？ 先生が そこに座って\n 私が 先生の真向かいに 座ってしまったりし:
What? You sit there and I sit right across
from you, and that means you're telling my
fortune...?

121774.「ええ。本日は 占い師 <pc>が\n あなたの悩みを 解決へと導きます。\n:
Yes, I am. Today, fortune teller <pc>
is here to help you with your problems. Are
you acquainted with <pc>?

121775.「はい！ 先生は 洗練されたセンスの持ち主で\n 女優を目指す私に 演技のレッス:
Yes! My teacher is a man of refined taste, and
is a wonderful person who gives acting lessons
to me, an aspiring actress.

121776.「演技だけでなく 占いまで こなせるなんて\n 先生は本当に 何でも お出来にな:
You can not only act but also tell fortunes,
you really can do anything. I admire you even
more!

121777.「なるほど。シュリナさんは 女優を目指して\n 毎日 演技の勉強に はげんでいる:
I see. So, Shrina, you are studying acting
every day in order to become an actress. What
is the problem that is troubling you?

121779.「……最近 自分に自信が持てなくて。\n このままじゃ 女優になって劇場に立つな:
Lately, I don't have confidence in myself. I'm afraid that if I don't do anything, my dream of becoming an actress and performing in the
theater will end...

121780.「だから 私 本当は……。\n いえ……でも こんなこと先生には……。:
So I really... no, but... but I didn't want to
tell you...

121782.「せ 先生……。お聞きしても よろしいですか？\n 正直なところ どうでしょうか:
Se, teacher... may I ask you a question?
Honestly, what do you think... do you think my
performance is growing?<yesno><close>

121783.「そ……そうですよね……。\n 自分でも そうじゃないかと 思っていたので\n:
Well...yes...I thought I might have been
right, so I'm a little...I'm about to cry.

121784.「ああ そんな。気をつかわないでください……。\n せっかく 先生に 教えていた:
Oh, no. Please don't worry about me... even
though you're teaching me, I'll always remain
inexperienced...

121786.「……どうやら ここは\n アルカナ・セラピアの 出番のようですね。:
...Apparently, this is where Arcana Serapia
comes in.

121787.「セラピアカードが シュリナさんの心の扉を\n 開いてくれるでしょう。さあ……\:
The Serapia Cards will open the door to
Shrina's heart. Now... ask her to draw a Card.

121788.シュリナは セラピアカードから\n「星」のカードを引いた！:
Shrina drew a "Star" card from her Serapia
Cards!

121789.なんと シュリナが引いたカードが\n不思議な声で <pc>に\n語りかけてくる…:
My God, the card Shrina drew speaks to
<pc> in a mysterious voice...

121790.<center>眠れる星を呼び覚まし その手につかめ。\n<%sEV_QUE_N:
Awaken the sleeping star and hold it in your
hands. Defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Trickstars.
Then the door to one's heart shall open.

121791.「星のカードに導かれ この <pc>が\n ふたたび あなたの前に 現れたとき\:
When <pc> appears before you again,
guided by the star card, all your problems
will be solved.

121792.「どうか 私たちの占いを信じて\n 心安らかに お待ちください……。:
Please, trust in our divination and wait with
peace of mind...

121793.「わかりました……ありがとうございます。\n 私はグレン城下町の いつもの場所に:
Okay...thank you very much. I'll be at my
usual place in Glen Castle Town. Sensei...I'll
be waiting for you.

121794.「ふふ……さすがは <pc>さん。\n 大陸をまたいで 活躍しているんですね。\:
Hmmm...that's what I'm talking about
<pc>. I see you've crossed
continents. She seems to adore you dearly.

121795.「だからこそ シュリナさんの悩みは\n あなたが 解決してあげるべきでしょう……:
That said, you should be the one to help Ms.
Shrina with her problems... what was this
trial like for you?

121796.「……なるほど。でしたら どの地域に生息する\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME0:
I see... If so, please defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Trickstars,
and just as before, it doesn't matter which
region they are found in.

121797.「たしか ウェナ諸島の キュララナ海岸の浜辺に \n たくさんいると 聞いたこと:
I have heard that there are many of them on the beaches of the Kyurarana Coast in the Wena Islands. I've also heard that they can be
found on the beaches of Gilzad Region.

121798.「試練を乗り越え カードにチカラが宿ったら\n 占い師の状態で シュリナさんのも:
Once you've gone through the trials and the cards have power, you go to Shrina in the state of a fortune teller, listen to her, and
hold up the cards.

121799.「そこから先は……もう おわかりですよね？\n 強力な心の闇が 襲ってくるかもし:
From there... you know the drill, don't you? A
powerful Dark Mind may attack, so be prepared
for it.

121800.「では 私たちの占いで シュリナさんの悩みを\n すっきり 解決してあげましょう:
Well then, let's give Shrina a clean slate for
her troubles with our divination. Good luck
<pc>!

121801.「モウ イヤ……ヤメタイ……。\n クルシイ……クルシイノ……。:
I don't want to... don't want to... crucii...
cruciiino...

121803.「ナニモカモガ ツラクテ……ツラスギテ……\n モウ ワカラナイノ…………！！: I don't know what to do...!

121806.「まだ二度目なのに アルカナ・セラピアを\n すっかり 使いこなしているようです:
This is only your second time with Arcana
Serapia, yet you seem to have mastered its
use.

121807.「……がんばっても 夢に 手が届かない。\n 自分には 才能がないのかもしれない:
...I can't reach my dream even if I try my
best. Maybe I have no talent. Maybe all my
efforts are in vain...

121808.「そんな 将来への不安と 自信のなさが\n 心の闇を 生み出してしまったのでしょ:
Such uncertainty about the future and a lack of self-confidence must have given birth to a Dark Mind. The more stubborn you are, the more
likely you are to be destroyed.

121809.「いつも シュリナさんを見守ってきた\n <cs_pchero>さんだからこそ:
I think it is because <cs_pchero> has always
looked out for Shrina that she was able to
clear her Dark Mind cleanly.

121810.「……以前 占い師の 究極の目的とは\n 人々の悩みを 解決することだと 言いま:
I once said that the ultimate goal of fortune
tellers is to solve people's problems. And
what we can do to help you do that is...

121811.「人々が抱える悩みと 真剣に向き合い\n その苦しみに 誠実に 寄り添い続けるこ:
To face people's problems seriously, and to continue to be close to their suffering with sincerity. To support people by telling them
that they are not alone.

121812.「<cs_pchero>さんは 私が教えなくても\n 自然とシュリナさんに……相:
<cs_pchero> naturally treated Shrina... with
compassion for the hearts of the counselors,
without me having to teach her.

121813.「私は その慈しみの心を持つことこそが\n 占い師としての適性であり 才能なので:
I believe that having that compassion is my
aptitude and talent as a fortune teller.

121814.「私の師匠も あなたのような 広い心を持ち\n 慈愛に満ちた 占い師なのですよ。:
My fortune teller is a broad-minded and compassionate fortune teller like yourself. Please allow me to introduce you to my master
in the near future.

121815.「さあ……元の世界へ 帰りましょう。\n 前と同じように シュリナさんの様子を見:
Now... let's go back to where we came from.
Please check on Shrina as you did before, and
then come back to Divine House.

121816.「……それでね 母さん。少しずつだけれど\n お客さんが 増えてきているんです！:
And you know what, Mom? Little by little,
we're getting more and more customers!

121817.「ユノの占い 大評判になってるわよ～。\n 悩みを きれいサッパリ 解決してくれ:
Juno's fortune-telling has become very
popular. He says he can solve all your
problems. That's amazing!

121818.「う うん……ユノはすごいよ。\n 僕とエゼルなんて 毎日 掃除するくらいしか\:
Juno is amazing. Me and Ezell, we don't do
anything but clean every day...

121819.「情けないわねえ。ニワトリ占いはどうなの？\n ちゃんとチキ坊と 修行してるんで:
That's pathetic. What about Chicken Divination? I hope you've been training with Chickibo properly. Or else I'm going to roast
you whole

121820.「だっ だめだよ母さん。いくらチキ坊が\n 大メシ食らいでも それだけは 勘弁し:
Oh, no, Mother. I don't care how much Chickibo
eats, but please don't do that...! I'll do my
training and clean the aviary properly.

121822.「母さん！ あたしは？ あたしはどう？\n ソーンなんかと違って 役に立ってるで:
Mom! Mom! What about me? What about me? Am I
useful? Unlike Thorn? I'm good, right? Hey,
hey, hey, hey!

121823.「んも～……かわいいっ。\n どうして あなたたち そんなにかわいいの？\n み:
You're so cute! Why are you guys so cute? I
want to squeeze you all together!

121824.「この 占いの館が うまくいってるのは\n みんなのおかげよ。いつも ありがとう:
Divine House is doing well because of you.
Thank you for everything... you are my hope!

121825.「あら……お客さんかしら。何かお困り？\n 悩みがあるなら 占ってあげましょうか:
Oh... you must be a customer. Are you in
trouble? If you have a problem, I can read
your fortune.

121826.<if_woman>「母さん。彼女が さっき話していた人です。\n 私たちを 手:
<if_woman>Mom. She's the one I was talking about
earlier. It's our new fortune teller
<pc> who is helping us.<else>Mom. He's the one I was talking about earlier.
It's our new fortune teller <pc> who
is helping us.<endif>

121827.「あらあら……まあまあ！ そうだったのね。\n あなたが ウワサの デキる新人の:
Oh dear... well, well, well! Oh, yes, that's
right. You must be the hot new girl I've heard
so much about~!

121828.「アタシは この占いの館のオーナーにして\n みんなのお師匠様 天才占い師マルグ:
I am the Owner's Mansion and everyone's teacher, the fortune teller Margaret. Welcome to Divine House. Welcome to the House of
Divination.

121829.「あなたの活躍は ユノから聞かせてもらったわ。\n アルカナ・セラピアを 使いこ:
Juno told me about your success. I bet you'll
make a good fortune teller in the future,
being able to use Arcana Serapia so well~!

121830.「そもそも アルカナ・セラピアっていうのは\n 占いの歴史から失われてしまった:
Arcana serapia is an ancient divination technique that has been lost in the history of divination. In the world of fortune tellers,
it is a secret art that has been called a phantom.

121831.「それを この 天才占い師様が\n 世界各地を巡って 研究を重ねた末\n ついに:
After traveling all over the world to study
it, this fortune teller genius finally revived
it in the modern age...that's how it happened.

121832.「い～い？ 占い師の 究極の目的は……\n 世界中から 悩める人々を 一切なくす:
Okay? The fortune teller's ultimate goal is to
rid the world of all afflicted people.

121833.「みんな幸せになりたいはずよ。くよくよ悩んで\n うじうじ腐るなんて まっぴらご:
Everyone wants to be happy. We don't want to be stuck in a funk, worrying and rotting. That's why we fortune tellers must take
action!

121834.「レッツ！ ハートのレボリューション★\n 心の大革命を 始めましょ！！:
Let's do it! Let's start a revolution of the
heart!

121835.「みんなの心を救うために あなたにも\n バンッバン 協力してもらっちゃうからね:
I'm going to get you to help me save
everyone's hearts and minds... and together
we're going to build the perfect world!

121836.「それじゃ また様子を見にくるわ。\n その時はまた 大活躍の武勇伝を聞かせて♪:
Well then, I'll come back to check on you. When I do, I'll be sure to hear about your great exploits again♪ and I look forward to
working with you~

121837.「母さんは 普段 お店にいないの。\n ちょ～忙しい占い師だから いつも旅に出て:
My mother is not usually at the store. She's a very busy fortune teller, so she's always on the road and comes back once in a while like
this.

121838.「相変わらず すごい ハイテンションだったね。\n いつも 自信たっぷりで すご:
Yes, yes. You are always so confident... I
want to learn from you... Chickibo?

121839.「ふふ……。さっそく <pc>さんのことを\n 母さんに 紹介できて よかったで:
I am glad that I could introduce <pc>
to my mother right away.

121840.「母さんは 孤児だった私たちを 引き取って\n 占いを教え 生きるすべを与えてく:
You took us in as orphans, taught us divination, and gave us a way to live... and I truly respect you as a mother and a teacher. I
truly respect her as a mother and a teacher.

121841.「母さんが抱く 大きな夢を かなえるためなら\n どんなことでも 協力したいんで:
I want to do whatever I can to help fulfill
your big dream. It's the only way I can repay
you.

121842.「<pc>さんが 仲間に加わってくれて\n 本当に 心強いです。これからも 一緒:
It is really encouraging to have <pc>
as a companion. Let's keep up the good work
together!

121843.「また 新しい仕事を 手伝ってくださる時は\n 占い師の状態で 私を訪ねてくださ:
If you ever need help with a new job, please
visit me again in my fortune teller state. I
look forward to your next visit!

122413.「そうそう。今回の報酬を お渡ししますね。\n あなたに よく似合うと思いますよ:
Yes, yes. I'll give you your reward for this
one. I think it will suit you well. Please,
receive it.

122414.「そうそう。今回の報酬を お渡ししますね。\n どうぞ 受け取ってください。:
Yes, yes. I'll hand you your reward for this
time. Please, receive it.

142643.「どうせ 私の演技なんて 誰にも\n 必要とされてないのに 女優になりたいなんて:
It's very presumptuous of me to want to be an
actress when no one wants my acting anyway...

142644.「そもそも 占いに頼ろうとしてる時点で\n 夢を追う資格なんて ないのかも……\:
I don't know if I'm qualified to pursue my
dreams if I'm relying on fortune-telling in
the first place...huh...

142645.<pc>は シュリナへの 思いを込めて\nテーブルに セラピアカードを並べた。:
<pc> laid out the Serapia Cards on
the table with thoughts for Shrina.

142647.「……今 シュリナさんが 引いたカードに\n 占い師の秘術 アルカナ・セラピアで:
Now Shrina will use the fortune teller's
secret Arcana Serapia to imbue the drawn Card
with special powers.
